note.p: Landed proprietor and farmer. Of Langraw, Hobkirk, Roxburghshire. Born in England. Died in Edinburgh.
Census returns of Scotland 1841 (The National Archives of Scotland: Hobkirk 3/11) 1871 (Hobkirk 2/10)
Scotland statutory deaths 685/5 248 Newington (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 13 June 2022)
